atkId_Bullet.Wiki: References AtkParam. Used to apply the damage characteristics to a project.

sfxId_Bullet.Wiki: Visual effect for projectile in transit.

sfxId_Hit.Wiki: Visual effect when projectile hits something.

sfxId_Flick.Wiki: Visual effect when projectile is deflected off of a shield.

hitRadiusMax.Wiki: Maximum radius of the hitbox, time hitbox changes from initial to max is determined by spreadTime. (If -1, radius is same as initial hitbox radius).

spreadTime.Wiki: Amount of time (in seconds) it takes for hitbox radius to grow from hitRadius to hitRadiusMax.

spEffectIDForShooter.Wiki: SpEffect applied to owner of bullet.

hitBulletID.Wiki: Bullet to generate when projectile expires.
